basics.name: Tse Hui Tung
basics.label: Senior Year Undergraduate Student
basics.summary: A passion-driven student who is building up his dream project

work.name: Konew FinTech Corp. Ltd.
summary: - Implemented cutting-edge technologies, including the Tesseract optical character recognition and transformer model, to proficiently execute document data retrieval from hand-taken photographs.

- Performed comprehensive pre-processing techniques on hand-captured photographs, encompassing document contour cropping, binarization, and resizing, to optimize the efficacy of bank statement classification and data recognition.
-Utilized Langchain coupled with a local large language model Falcon-7b and web scraping techniques to perform knowledge embeddings on product information.

education.institution: The Chinese University of Hong Kong

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
